# WeSocket

#### 项目介绍
简化Socketjs-client 与 stompjs 操作


#### 使用说明
```
import WeSocket from 'WeSocket';
let socket = new WeSocket();
//let gv = new WeSocket.Gv(user);

socket = new WeSocket("protocol://hostname:port/websocket", user);
socket.on("connected", frame => {
    console.log("connected", this, frame);
}).on("close", () => {
    console.log("close", this);
}).on("error", error => {
    console.log("error", this, error);
}).on(["broadcast", "notice", "group", "role"], (evt, msg, id) => {
    switch (evt) {
        case 'chat':
        case 'join':
        case 'leave':
            append(msg);
            break;
        default:
            break;
    }
}).connect({
    ready: () => {
        console.log("ready !!!!");
    },
    reconnect: true,
    debug: false
});

```
